entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h except 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
